overview_of_class: This course is being used as a place holder for a new course CSD 320 Introduction to Speech, Language, Learning and Their Disorders. Anyone registering for this course will be switched over to CSD 320 once CSD 320 has been approved and entered into CAESAR. The course description for CSD 320 is: Overview of normal and disordered communication. Speech, language, cognitive development and hearing disorders across the age continuum according to etiology, clinical manifestations, and intervention. Anatomy and physiology of speech, language, and hearing. Psychosocial impact of communicative disorders. Settings for service delivery; ethical and legal considerations; and professional issues.
name: Special Topics in Communication Sciences and Disorders
subject: CSD
